string.text: artifacts,trading,loner
Brothers, found a stash of artifacts near the Garbage. Anyone interested in splitting the haul?
%speaker_first_name%, you know we loners share when we can. Count me in.
Good to hear. Meet me at the old gas station. We'll divide it fair and square.
That's what I like about us free stalkers - we look out for each other.
survival,advice,loner
New guy here. Any fellow loners got tips for surviving solo?
First rule of being a free stalker: trust nobody completely, but help when you can.
Got it. Stay sharp and keep moving.
bandits,ambush,loner
Heard bandits laying traps around the old collapsed bunker. They’ve got tripwires and flashbangs—stay sharp.
%speaker_first_name%, that bunker’s a deathtrap now. Move slow, check every corner.
Understood. I’ll stick to the perimeter and use my detector for anomalies.
Good thinking. Bandits hate surprises almost as much as anomalies.
military,patrol,loner
Military’s stepped up patrols by Yanov railway yard, snipers on the rooftop and buried sensors.
Great. You got any passes? They’re scanning IDs with handheld scanners now.
Only forged papers that still raise eyebrows. Thinking of skipping that sector entirely.
Better to cross through the old sewage tunnels, cold and smelly, but they won’t check down there.
checkpoint,avoidance,loner
That new military checkpoint on the north bridge is clogging the route. Anyone know a back trail?
Use the service road through the mine shaft entrance,dark and winding, but you’ll skip the guards.
Copy that. Hope the mutants haven’t made a nest down there.
If they did, they’re more afraid of you than you of them—just watch for echoes.
loot,military,loner
Found a stash of military-grade ammo in an abandoned guard post, enough rounds for a heavy machine gun.
Not bad. You selling or trading for supplies?
I’m swapping for med-kits and radiation filters, don’t need more bullets stored on my back.
Smart move. Ammo’s heavy and can paint a target on your back in the wrong hands.
bandits,ambush,loner,warning
Heard bandits rigged tripwires around the old collapsed bunker, came back to find a mate bleeding out.
%speaker_first_name%, they’re using flashbangs too, light up the blind spots and pounce.
Flashbangs? Damn. I’ll need to pack extra earplugs and keep low.
Yeah, and watch for loose cables, some wired to explosives. Move slow, check every step.
Got it. Might send a dog first, see if it triggers anything.
Risky. Those bandits train dogs to run back, setting off traps when you’re near.
Fair point. Maybe a rock throw to trigger from distance, then dash in.
Smart. After the blast, grab whatever loot you can, then vanish before they regroup.
Sounds like a plan. Thanks for the heads-up, won’t forget this one.
military,patrol,stealth,loner
Heard military’s set up new patrols by the Yanov rail yard, snipers on the roofs and motion sensors in the yard.
You got any intel on their shift changes?
Around midnight is quietest, the sensors go into standby for maintenance checks.
Midnight run, then. What about the dogs?
They kennel them near the east wall, avoid that side, or use a silenced pistol if you have to.
Got my old suppressed Vintorez, should do the trick.
Good. Move under the cover of the railway cars, avoid open ground.
Understood. In and out before the next sweep.
bandits,cordon,loner,warning
Anyone else notice bandits popping up around the Cordon checkpoint more often these days?
%speaker_first_name%, I’ve seen squads of them camping by the railway embankment at dusk.
They’re getting bolder, jumping lone stalkers on the supply path near the old boiler house.
Yeah, and they’ve rigged tripwires in the tall grass east of the checkpoint. Caught my friend off guard.
Those cowards. Hit you while you’re down, then vanish into the trees with your gear.
We need to clear them out, no sense letting Cordon turn into their playground.
Agreed. I’ll scout their camp at first light and mark any traps.
Good plan. I’ll bring some smoke grenades and cover your exit, make them scatter like rats.
bandits,camp,cordon,loner
Passed by that hollowed out silo west of the Cordon, bandits are using it as a makeshift camp now.
%speaker_first_name%, I saw smoke rising last night, figured it was just a forest fire.
Nope, heard them shouting orders, got at least a dozen in there armed with everything they stole.
We should hit them before they dig in further. There is no telling when they will start taxing stalkers.
Agreed. I will slip in under cover of fog and plant some charges by the food barrels.
I will circle south and block their retreat, no one gets away with our gear.
Alright. Meet at the old water tower at 0300. Keep it quiet and quick.
military,deserters,info,loner
Heard a couple of military deserters set up near the cornfield to trade intel for extra rations.
Deserters? They must be running low on supplies if they are talking to loners.
Yeah, they have maps of patrol routes in Yanov but their scope is scratched to pieces.
Could be useful. I might trade them some ammo for a fresh look at those maps.
Just watch your back. Deserters flip sides fast when the Zone gets too hot.
True. I will approach cautiously, offer them filtered water first, then see if they are legit.
Solid. If they double cross we will know before they even draw their weapons.
bandits,raid,cordon,loner
Heard those bandit fuckers raided our cache by the old boiler house before first light.
%speaker_first_name%, they blew the lock off with a grenade and cleared us out in minutes.
Jesus. They must have had inside info or a scout watching our shifts.
They did. Saw one of our own trailing them last week and talking too friendly.
Betrayal cuts deeper than a bullet. We need to burn that informant’s ass.
I agree. Tonight at midnight we hit their camp by the railway embankment.
I will rig some flashbangs at their perimeter then lure them into the clearing.
Good plan. I will circle south and seal off their exit. No one walks away with our gear.
anomalies,warning,loner
Heads up heard a flicker anomaly near the north bunker just past the willow grove.
%speaker_first_name%, that anomaly tears your kit apart if you get too close.
I lost a filter and a detector walking through its edge last week.
Best skirt it wide use your compass and stick to the trench line.
Agreed I will mark it on my map and warn any lone runners I meet.
Good thinking nothing worse than watching your buddy fry for a shiny bit.
artifacts,barter,loner
Picked up a weird heat pack artifact near the shovel zone thinking of trading it.
%speaker_first_name%, heat packs fetch a good price with that Doc at the Mobile Lab.
Doc offloads filters medkits and sometimes ammo no questions asked.
I want two filters and a full medkit pack if he will.
I can swing by his truck on my next run through the Cordon and broker the deal.
Solid let us meet at the derelict watchtower at dusk he likes low light deals.
Understood I will bring extra ammo just in case he gets greedy.
supplies,morale,loner
Rations are almost gone I have two cans of fish left and a half bottle of water.
%speaker_first_name%, I feel you I have one medkit and no filters.
We need to hit that supply droppoint by the old radio tower tomorrow morning.
That droppoint is crawling with Duty patrols now they check every pack.
Then we ghost through the drainage ditch behind the hill keep low and quiet.
If we snag a couple medkits and filters I will owe you one.
No debts between loners trade favors not IOUs.
mutant,escape,strategy,loner
Nearly got jumped by a pack of snorks near the abandoned factory. Those bastards are learning to flank.
You still breathing? What was your exit strategy?
Ducked into that underground pipe network. They won't follow through narrow spaces.
Smart play. Just watch for bloodsuckers down there. Heard they nest in the deeper sections.
radiation,hotspot,warning,loner
Heads up - the northern swamp sector's radiation levels spiked overnight. My detector maxed out at 500 roentgen.
Shit. That's where I was headed for artifact hunting. Alternative routes?
Stick to the railroad embankment. Longer but safer. Bring extra iodine.
Appreciate the warning. Almost walked into a death trap.
stash,discovery,sharing,loner
Found an untouched military stash under the collapsed bridge. Ammo, meds, even some grenades.
You sharing coordinates or keeping it to yourself?
Marking it on the shared map. But hurry - Duty scouts are patrolling nearby.
That's why I love this community. Paying it forward saves lives.
emission,aftermath,help,loner
That last emission scrambled half my gear. Anyone got spare bolts or detector parts?
I've got extra bolts. Meet at the usual spot. You still owe me from the snork incident though.
Fair enough. Bringing that artifact fragment I promised as payment.
Deal. And I'll throw in some bandages - you look like shit.
barter,economy,trading,loner
What's the current exchange rate? Got 5.45 ammo but need 9x39 for my Vintorez.
Three to one last I checked. Better off trading for filters first, then swapping those.
Ugh. This is why I miss pre-emission markets. Anyone seen Sidorovich lately?
Alive but paranoid. Demands blood tests before trading now. Radiation paranoia.
newbie,advice,survival,loner
Fresh meat here. Any veteran stalkers willing to share essential Zone wisdom?
Rule one: Trust your detector more than your eyes. Rule two: Never run toward gunfire.
Noted.
And for Christ's sake, check your six constantly. The Zone kills the careless.
false_alarm,relief,loner
Thought I saw Monolith scouts near the sawmill. Nearly shit myself.
And?
Just Freedom idiots in stolen armor. Nearly blew their heads off before recognizing the patches.
Those morons are gonna get themselves killed playing dress-up.
repair,gear,help,loner
My detector's acting up after that electrical anomaly. Anyone good with electronics?
Try reseating the crystal contacts. Common issue after EMP-type exposures.
Already did. Still giving false negatives on grav anomalies.
Bring it by my camp. Got a spare multimeter. Payment in ammo or filters.
lore,rumors,history,loner
Heard an old tale about the X-7 lab. Some say the first emission originated there.
Bullshit. Everyone knows it was the CNPP reactor. The lab was just another failed experiment.
Then why do all artifacts near X-7 test positive for unique isotopes?
...Okay, that's actually interesting. Maybe worth investigating.
watch,shift,security,loner
Taking first watch tonight. Saw fresh boot prints near the perimeter.
Bandits or worse?
Could be military scouts. Prints had that distinctive tread pattern.
I'll take second watch then. Two sets of eyes better than one.
food,scarcity,hunting,loner
Down to my last ration pack. Any good hunting grounds that aren't mutant-infested?
West of the rail yard. Boars still roam there, and the meat tests clean.
Watch for snorks though. They've started hunting the same herds.
Always something. Thanks for the tip - I'll take my silenced rifle.
injury,recovery,help,loner
Took a graze from a bandit ambush. Nothing serious but my medkits expired.
You at the old depot? I've got fresh bandages and antiseptic.
Yeah, holed up in the guard shack. Door's rigged with a tin can alarm.
On my way. Save me some of that vodka you're definitely drinking.
missing,search,remembrance,loner
Anyone seen Markov? Was supposed to meet at the checkpoint three days ago.
Last spotted heading toward the chemical plant. That was before the emission though.
Damn. He knew the risks but... he was a good stalker.
Toast his memory at the campfire tonight. Zone claims us all eventually.
sighting,strange,rumor,loner
Saw something... weird near the dead city. Like a stalker, but moving all wrong.
Another Monolith fanatic?
No. This was different. Glitchy, like a broken hologram. Then it just... vanished.
Lay off the vodka before patrols. But... I've heard similar stories lately.
artifact,discovery,danger,loner
Found a cluster of Sparklers in the anomaly field near the construction site. Never seen so many in one place.
That's the third report this week. The Zone is coughing up artifacts like never before.
Yeah, and that's what worries me. Last time this happened was right before the '06 blowout.
Then we stock up while we can. I'm making one last run before sunset.
betrayal,caution,trust,loner
Watch out for a stalker called "Viper". Turned in two loners to Duty for the bounty last night.
What? He shared our campfire just three days ago!
Mark his description - red sunrise patch on his backpack. Word is he's working with the traders now.
Another reason to trust only your rifle and your detector in the Zone.
equipment,modification,advice,loner
Anyone know how to stabilize a Gauss rifle without the proper parts? Mine's kicking like a mule.
Try wrapping the barrel with rubber strips from old tires. Cuts vibration by 40%.
Where'd you learn that trick?
Ex-military engineer. The Zone makes improvisers of us all.
dreams,zone,psychic,loner
Been having... strange dreams since that last emission. Like the Zone is whispering.
Not this shit again. Next you'll be preaching about the Monolith.
No, not like that. More like... patterns. Like it's trying to show me safe routes.
Get your head checked at the ecologist camp. Radiation psychosis starts subtle.
traps,bandits,warning,loner
Bandits are rigging abandoned stashes now. Saw two rookies get blown sky high near the car park.
Old tactic. Always scan for tripwires and pressure plates before approaching.
These were new - motion sensors hooked to RPG rounds. Military grade shit.
Then we spread the word. And maybe leave some... surprises of our own along their routes.
bunker,discovery,history,loner
Found an intact Soviet-era bunker under the old farmhouse. Walls are lined with lead - perfect emission shelter.
Claimed or up for grabs?
Shared space. Left the coordinates at the 100 Rads bulletin board. Just don't trash the place.
Real stalker spirit. I'll bring some supplies to stock it next time I pass through.
mutant,evolution,danger,loner
Bloodsuckers are changing. Saw one phase through a solid wall near Yantar.
Bullshit. They're fast, not ghostly.
Wish I was joking. My bullet passed right through it before it solidified again.
If the mutants are evolving, we need new tactics. Flamethrowers might be the only answer now.
faction,tensions,warning,loner
Duty and Freedom are gearing up for another skirmish near the army warehouses.
Great. Just when artifact hunting was getting good there.
Word is they're conscripting loners at gunpoint now. Avoid the area for a week.
Thanks for the heads up. I'll reroute through the swamps.
technology,discovery,danger,loner
Found a weird device in the X-18 lab. Looks like a detector but shows... something else.
Turn it off. Now. That's psy-tech from the C-Con project.
Too late. It... showed me things. The structure of the Zone. Like a map but alive.
Get to the ecologists immediately. That's how the Monolith recruits start.
sidorovich,trading,complaints,loner
Just came from Sidorovich. That fat bastard offered me 2000 rubles for a Jellyfish artifact.
%speaker_first_name%, he tried the same shit with me last week. Said the market was "oversaturated."
Meanwhile he's charging triple for basic medkits. How's a stalker supposed to survive?
That's why I started trading with the ecologists directly. Better rates, less bullshit.
Until you need ammo at 3 AM and they're all asleep in their bunker.
True. Sidorovich may be a leech, but he's our leech.
military,duty,politics,loner
Saw military patrols sharing intel with Duty near the checkpoint. They're getting cozy.
%speaker_first_name%, those fascists deserve each other. Both want to control everything.
Next thing you know, they'll be setting up joint checkpoints to tax us harder.
Let them try. We know every rat hole and tunnel in the Zone.
Still, it's worrying. United, they could squeeze us out of the good hunting grounds.
Then we remind them why free stalkers have survived this long. Adapt or die.
freedom,military,conflict,loner
Military's been sniffing around Freedom's warehouse, offering "protection" deals.
Ha! Freedom told them to fuck off, I hope?
Nah, some of the younger Freedom guys are considering it. Easy money, they say.
Sellouts. Freedom used to stand for something - keeping the Zone free.
%speaker_first_name%, everyone's got a price when rations run low.
Not us loners. We'd rather starve free than eat from their hand.
sidorovich,debt,humor,loner
Sidorovich says I owe him for that detector repair. Swears it was top-tier work.
Top-tier? He probably just hit it with a hammer and prayed.
Thing still beeps at shadows. Now he wants three artifacts as payment.
Tell him you'll pay when his "top-tier" work actually works.
%speaker_first_name%, I tried. He threatened to blacklist me from his vodka supply.
The ultimate threat. Guess you're artifact hunting tomorrow then.
duty,recruitment,warning,loner
Duty's recruiting hard. Offering signing bonuses and "guaranteed" safe sectors.
Yeah, guaranteed to get you killed following their suicide orders.
They cornered me yesterday, gave the whole "save humanity" speech.
What'd you tell them?
That I'd rather save myself, thanks. They didn't like that answer.
%speaker_first_name%, stay clear of their checkpoint for a while. They hold grudges.
faction,politics,independence,loner
Both Freedom and Duty keep trying to claim the factory district. It's getting ugly.
Let them fight. More artifacts for us while they play war.
Problem is they're hassling any loner who passes through, demanding loyalty oaths.
Loyalty? To what? Their stupid ideologies?
Exactly. I told them my only loyalty is to staying alive and getting paid.
The only honest answer in the Zone, %speaker_first_name%.
military,corruption,opportunity,loner
That military sergeant at the south checkpoint is dirty. Takes bribes for passage.
How much?
5000 rubles or a decent artifact. Cheaper than getting shot trying to sneak around.
That's really useful. What's his schedule?
Night shifts, Tuesday through Friday. Look for the one with the scarred left hand.
Information like this is why loners survive. We share what matters, thank you brat.
sidorovich,monopoly,alternatives,loner
We need to break Sidorovich's monopoly. His prices are getting insane.
Good luck with that. He's got connections everywhere.
What if we set up our own trading post? Pool resources, undercut his prices.
%speaker_first_name%, he'd sabotage us within a week. Remember what happened to Petrov?
Petrov tried to go solo. Together, we'd have a chance.
Maybe. But who'd run it? Trust is thin among loners.
duty,freedom,neutrality,loner
Duty patrol tried to conscript me yesterday. Freedom squad "rescued" me today. Both want gratitude.
Two sides of the same faction coin. What'd you do?
Told them both I had radiation sickness and ran like hell.
Ha! Classic. They probably argued about who contaminated you.
%speaker_first_name%, staying neutral is getting harder every day.
That's why we stick together. Loners don't need their wars.
military,duty,alliance,concern,loner
Rumours of Military and Duty signing some kind of cooperation agreement.
Shit. There goes half our smuggling routes.
Talk of running a joint patrol near the barrier.
This is bad, %speaker_first_name%. Real bad for independent operators.
Time to find new routes. The Zone's bigger than their ambitions.
Or we make their alliance... costly. Few well-placed incidents might cool their friendship.
Dangerous thinking, but might be necessary. The Zone belongs to no one.
mission,patrol,dolg
Alpha Squad, report in. What's the status on the sweep through Sector 7?
Sector is clear. Twelve confirmed kills. No casualties. We’re moving to extraction.
Understood. Return to base. Debrief on arrival. Maintain formation until you're behind the wire.
discipline,order,dolg
Reminder: equipment check at 0800 sharp. No excuses. No delays.
Confirmed. My rifle's clean enough to eat off. Same as always.
That’s the standard. Keep it. The Zone doesn’t give second chances.
ideology,zone,dolg
The Zone is a threat to humanity. Every day we let it grow, more lives are at risk.
Agreed. We’re not here for glory or profit. We’re here to contain this madness.
Contain it, and eventually purge it. That’s the mission.
bandits,security,dolg
Spotted three bandits loitering near the checkpoint east of Rostok. No gear, just rifles.
They’re probably scouting. Bandits don't move unless they're desperate or planning something.
Orders?
Engage if they approach. If they back off, let them run. We don’t waste bullets on cowards unless we have to.
leadership,command,dolg
Colonel's been quiet lately. You think something's going on?
If he’s not talking, it means he’s working. You know how he operates.
Right. Calm before the storm, then.
Exactly. Keep your gear tight and your ears open.
orders,discipline,internal
Reminder to all Dolg units: Any unauthorized trades with stalkers will result in disciplinary action.
Understood. We serve the mission, not personal profit.
One of ours was caught selling ammo to a bandit in disguise. He’s being dealt with.
Good. The Zone tempts even strong men. Weak ones don’t belong in our ranks.
Keep your eyes open. The Zone corrupts more than just flesh.
freedom,conflict,border
Freedom patrol spotted near our checkpoint again. Loitering without cause.
Let them stare. They're looking for a reason to provoke us.
If they cross the line, we respond. No hesitation.
Orders are clear. Do not initiate, but if fired upon, end it quickly.
Freedom wants to make the Zone a playground. We’re here to build a wall around it.
freedom,threat,ideology,dolg
Freedom operatives were spotted near the Rostok checkpoint again. Same group as last week.
They were warned. If they keep testing our lines, we will treat them as hostiles.
Command believes they are scouting for new smuggling routes. Possibly trying to stir local support.
Let them preach their anarchist nonsense. Discipline is what keeps men alive out here, not ideology.
Their so-called freedom is just another word for chaos. No command structure, no rules, just a ticking bomb.
We lost two patrols last month to zones they claimed were safe. Their negligence is criminal.
Freedom talks about coexistence with the Zone. There is no coexistence with death and radiation.
Every time they sabotage our containment efforts, more civilians die outside the perimeter.
This isn't politics. It's security. Freedom is a threat to everything we're trying to hold together.
Orders stand. If they cross our line again, we respond with force. The Zone does not forgive mistakes, and neither do we.
discipline,rogue,containment,dolg
We've detained a rogue stalker near Garbage. Claimed he was "just passing through."
Passing through restricted territory with suppressed weapons and forged papers?
Exactly. We suspect he's ex-Freedom or a black market courier.
Interrogate him thoroughly. If he’s clean, send him back limping. If he’s not, bury him quietly.
Understood. We’ll extract whatever intel he has. No loose ends.
Also, remind Delta squad their patrol logs are overdue. Protocol applies to everyone.
Already on it. I’ll have their squad lead write it up manually if I have to.
Good. We don't let disorder fester — not outside, and definitely not within.
freedom,engagement,dolg,conflict
Recon drone spotted a Freedom patrol near the border of Rostok. They're probing again.
They're testing our perimeter. Looking for weak spots like rats chewing at wire.
Orders?
Shadow them. No contact unless fired upon. I want to know where they sleep and who they meet.
Copy that. If they so much as sneeze in our direction, they’ll regret walking upright.
This isn't about pride. It's containment. Freedom spreads chaos under the guise of liberty.
Letting the Zone run wild is suicide. We've seen what happens when there's no order.
They pretend to be idealists. In reality, they're drugged-up looters with a flag.
One day command will greenlight a purge. When that day comes, we finish the job.
Until then, we hold the line. No ground given. No compromises.
anomaly,threat,dolg,patrol
Patrol Bravo, report your findings near the collapsed train tunnel.
We've located a dense anomaly cluster. Thermal, electrical, and gravitational signatures. Unstable and expanding.
Any civilian or stalker presence nearby?
Negative. Area seems abandoned. One burnt body stuck mid-air, likely got too curious.
Mark the perimeter with warning signs. Secure a fallback route. Command may want samples taken later.
Understood. Requesting a science team to handle the core readings. It's beyond safe levels for combat units.
Request acknowledged. Maintain a safe distance. The Zone mutates faster than we can measure.
Copy that. We'll post a two-man watch and rotate every hour. No one goes near it without orders.
That's protocol. We don't lose men to curiosity. Duty comes first. Always.
checkpoint,rotation,schedule,dolg
Why is Squad Delta still manning Checkpoint 3? Their rotation was due four hours ago.
Logistics error. New shift got rerouted to reinforce the northern bunker.
That’s unacceptable. Checkpoint fatigue leads to mistakes. Get a replacement squad in place immediately.
Already on it. Bravo Squad is prepping to redeploy. Should be in position within the hour.
Inform Delta Squad to stand down and proceed to rest cycle as soon as relieved.
maintenance,logistics,inspection,dolg
Reminder to all units: monthly weapon maintenance logs are due by 1800 hours tonight.
Understood. Our armorer is finalizing documentation now. We had two rifles flagged for parts replacement.
Make sure serial numbers match inventory. Last month’s audit turned up three undocumented sidearms.
Affirmative. We’ll verify everything before submission. No intention of giving the quartermaster another headache.
security,access,breach,dolg
Who authorized entry for the civilian technician at East Gate this morning?
Should have been escorted. I’ll pull the gate log and cross-check the access codes.
Don’t rely on verbal authorizations. If it’s not in the registry, it’s not approved. Period.
Understood. We’ll review camera footage as well. If the breach is confirmed, disciplinary measures will follow.
paperwork,incident,report,dolg
Your incident report from the warehouse patrol yesterday is missing timestamps and coordinates.
I’ll correct and resend. Thought the debrief covered it, but I understand it has to be official.
Everything needs to be written down. Field data feeds command decisions. Sloppy reports get people killed.
Roger. Will attach audio transcript from helmet comms as well for clarity.
idcard,administration,renewal,dolg
Reminder: all personnel must renew their base access cards by the end of the week. No exceptions.
Mine expired last month and nobody said a word. Nearly got locked out of the armory.
That’s on you. Notices were posted in the mess, comms, and morning briefing. Stay current or stay outside.
Copy that. Just booked my renewal slot. Not repeating that mistake again.
artifact,confiscation,procedure,dolg
Intercepted a Loner carrying three Moonlight artifacts near checkpoint Gamma. Claims they're "for research."
Standard confiscation protocol. Document his details and warn him about restricted zones.
He's demanding compensation. Says he risked his life for these.
The Zone doesn't issue refunds. Send him on his way before Freedom sympathizers show up.
mutant,incursion,containment,dolg
Bloodsucker pack breached perimeter fence Sector 5-East. Two casualties.
Seal the breach with flamethrower teams. Deploy UV spotlights along the wire.
Request permission to use experimental sonic emitters. Science Corps left them here for testing.
Negative. Stick to proven methods. We're soldiers, not lab rats.
deserter,hunt,discipline,dolg
Private Volkov failed to report for duty. Took his rifle and three magazines.
Track his implant signal. Last known contacts?
Was seen talking to Freedom scouts yesterday. Signal last pinged near Army Warehouses.
Assemble retrieval team. Alive if possible. Dead if necessary.
supply,shortage,rationing,dolg
Medkit inventory shows 40% deficit. Bandage stocks critical.
Blame the last emission. Half our shipments got fried in transit.
Implement tiered rationing. Combat units get priority. Admin staff can use field dressings.
Understood. Also confiscating civilian med supplies at checkpoints until further notice.
radiation,spike,protocol,dolg
Rad levels spiked 300% in northern sectors. Some areas hitting 50 roentgen.
Seal the area. Redirect all patrols. Update the hazard maps.
Ecologists are requesting access for readings. Standard denial?
Affirmative. Their curiosity isn't worth the decon procedures.
recruits,training,indoctrination,dolg
New recruit intake arriving tomorrow. Twenty candidates from Kyiv.
Schedule ideological briefing first. Weed out the glory-seekers and artifact hunters.
Already prepared the orientation videos. Including the... graphic ones from the '12 containment breach.
Good. They need to understand what we're fighting against.
sabotage,investigation,security,dolg
Anomaly detectors at Checkpoint 7 were tampered with. Showing false negatives.
Casualties?
One patrol walked into a vortex. Two dead, one critical.
Lockdown the base. Polygraph every technician who serviced those units.
propaganda,disinformation,freedom,dolg
Freedom's broadcasting new lies about us "hoarding artifacts." Civilians are buying it.
Standard anarchist tactics. Undermine authority, then exploit the chaos.
Request permission to jam their frequencies. At least near our checkpoints.
Denied. Let them talk. Our actions speak louder than their lies.
monolith,activity,threat,dolg
Monolith forces massing near the Red Forest. Unusually coordinated movements.
They're preparing for something. Increase drone surveillance.
Recommend preemptive artillery strike on their gathering points.
Negative. Conserve ammunition. Fortify our positions instead.
veteran,memorial,honor,dolg
Sergeant Petrenko didn't make it. Radiation poisoning from the Yantar mission.
Twenty-two years of service. Add his name to the Wall of Honor.
Request permission to recover his dog tags. The body's in a hot zone.
Denied. No more good soldiers die for sentimentality.
emission,preparedness,protocol,dolg
Emission probability at 65%. All patrols recalled per protocol.
Seal the bunkers. Double-check oxygen scrubbers.
Two squads still unaccounted for near the chemical plant.
Their implants show life signs. Lockdown proceeds as scheduled.
weapons,testing,experimental,dolg
New anomaly-suppression rounds arrived from Kyiv. Field tests scheduled.
Volunteers?
Already selected from disciplinary roster. They earn their way back to good standing.
Document everything. If these work, we can finally clear the Garbage bottleneck.
border,dispute,military,dolg
Ukrainian Army claims we overstepped the demarcation line near Agroprom.
Our maps show otherwise. Pull the satellite imagery from '17.
They're threatening to cut our supply route unless we withdraw.
Stand firm. They need our anomaly reports more than we need their bureaucracy.
psionic,defense,research,dolg
Science Division developed new psi-blockers. 80% effectiveness in trials.
Side effects?
Headaches, temporary blindness. Better than becoming Monolith puppets.
Issue to front-line units only. I want daily reports on efficacy.
containment,breach,emergency,dolg
Massive anomaly expansion in Sector 9! Perimeter fences melting like wax.
Evacuate all personnel to secondary positions. Prepare scorched-earth protocols.
Ecologists are screaming about data loss. Orders?
Let them scream. Human lives come before research notes.
equipment,complaint,bureaucracy,dolg
%speaker_first_name%, my squad's been requesting new body armor for three weeks. Still using plates with bullet holes.
Fill out form R-47B, not R-47A. That's why it keeps getting rejected.
There's a difference? They look identical.
R-47B is for combat-damaged equipment. R-47A is for standard wear. Bureaucracy keeps us organized.
Meanwhile, my men are patching armor with duct tape and prayers.
I'll expedite it through supply. But next time, read the damn forms.
casual,offtime,dolg
%speaker_first_name%, you joining us for cards tonight? Got that good vodka from the last supply run.
Can't. Drawing night watch again. Someone's got to keep Freedom from sneaking around.
Third night this week? You piss off the duty roster sergeant?
Mentioned his reports were getting sloppy. Guess this is my reward.
Hah! Never criticize the man who controls your sleep schedule.
civilians,checkpoint,frustration,dolg
Another group of tourists tried to bribe their way past Checkpoint 3. When will they learn?
What'd they offer this time?
Euros and some sob story about scientific research. Same shit, different day.
At least they didn't try to run the checkpoint like last month's group.
True. Cleaning bloodstains off the concrete is a pain.
Speaking of which, we need more warning signs. The current ones aren't clear enough.
"Trespassers Will Be Shot" seems pretty clear to me.
You'd think so, but civilians are dumber than mutants sometimes.
veterans,history,nostalgia,dolg
%speaker_first_name%, remember when we first set up the Rostok perimeter? Just tents and sandbags.
And that winter storm that nearly buried us. Lost three men to hypothermia.
But we held the line. No mutants got through. No artifacts smuggled out.
Now look at it. Concrete walls, automated turrets, proper barracks.
Progress through discipline. Though I miss the simplicity sometimes.
The mission's the same. Keep the Zone contained, keep humanity safe.
logistics,complaint,supplies,dolg
Supply convoy's late again. We're down to emergency rations.
Blame the bureaucrats in Kyiv. They think the Zone runs on paperwork.
Meanwhile, we're eating decade-old MREs and calling it gourmet.
At least it's not mutant meat like those Freedom degenerates.
Don't knock it till you've tried it... kidding! Protocol violation.
I'm reporting that joke to morale enforcement.
Come on, %speaker_first_name%, we're all hungry here.
recruits,hazing,training,dolg
The new recruits are here. Time for "orientation."
Going easy on them or full boot camp treatment?
Full treatment. One's already crying about missing his girlfriend.
The Zone doesn't care about your feelings, recruit!
Remember when they made us clean latrines with toothbrushes?
Builds character. And ensures they follow decontamination protocols.
Plus it's fun watching them realize this isn't a video game.
monolith,combat,debrief,dolg
Debrief on the Monolith engagement. They fought to the last man, as usual.
Fanatics. But their tactics are evolving. Using flanking maneuvers now.
%speaker_first_name%, you were on point. What's your assessment?
They're not just mindless anymore. Someone's teaching them real combat doctrine.
Ex-military joining their ranks?
Or they're learning from fighting us. Either way, we need new strategies.
I'll draft a report for command. This changes our threat assessment.
corruption,artifact,investigation,dolg
Internal Affairs is sniffing around. Someone's been skimming artifacts.
Shit. Any idea who?
They're looking at Checkpoint 5 staff. Three artifacts went "missing" last month.
%speaker_first_name%, weren't you stationed there?
Two weeks ago, yeah. Everything was clean on my watch.
Better have your paperwork straight. IA doesn't fuck around.
My logs are spotless. Can't say the same for the night shift though.
Throwing them under the bus already?
It's not throwing under if it's true. Duty before friendship.
medical,injury,concern,dolg
How's Volkov doing? Heard the medics worked on him for hours.
Lost his left eye, but he'll live. Lucky bastard.
Controller got him?
Shrapnel from his own grenade. Bounced off anomaly field.
Shit. That's why we follow engagement protocols.
He knows. Kept apologizing even while bleeding out.
checkpoint,tension,protocol,dolg
%speaker_first_name%, heard you had a situation at the checkpoint yesterday.
Group of Loners got aggressive when we confiscated their artifacts.
How aggressive?
One pulled a knife. Big mistake.
Casualties?
He'll be eating through a straw for a month. Others got the message.
Good. Can't show weakness at the checkpoints.
freedom,infiltration,security,dolg
Security briefing mentioned possible Freedom infiltrators among the new recruits.
Those anarchist bastards getting desperate?
Command thinks they want our patrol schedules and supply routes.
Let them try. Our screening process will catch them.
%speaker_first_name%, you trained some of the new batch. Notice anything odd?
One kid kept asking about "individual freedoms" during ideology class.
Red flag. Name?
Already reported to Internal Security. They're watching him.
food,morale,complaint,dolg
This fucking porridge tastes like wallpaper paste.
Nutrients over flavor, soldier. It keeps you alive.
I'd rather eat MREs. At least those pretend to have flavor.
Put in a form 22-C food quality complaint.
And wait six months for them to tell me to shut up and eat?
Welcome to military bureaucracy, %speaker_first_name%.
ecologists,cooperation,tension,dolg
Ecologists are complaining we're blocking their research again.
Good. Less eggheads poking anomalies means less containment breaches.
They claim their research could help us fight the Zone better.
We don't need to understand it. We need to contain it.
%speaker_first_name%, didn't you used to escort their teams?
Yeah. Lost two men because they "had to get closer" to an anomaly.
See? Their curiosity gets our people killed.
night,watch,story,dolg
Quiet night?
Too quiet. Makes me nervous.
Zone's always planning something when it's silent.
Saw some lights moving in the anomaly field. Didn't look natural.
Log it. Command tracks patterns in anomalous activity.
Already did. Third time this week, same sector.
%speaker_first_name%, you've been here longest. Ever see anything like that before?
Once. Right before a major emission. Stay alert.
combat,story,veterans,dolg
Tell the rookies about the Battle of the Barrier.
Which one? We've had five "Battles of the Barrier."
The one where Freedom tried to breach with technicals.
Ah, that clusterfuck. RPGs versus machine guns.
We held the line. Lost twelve men, but not one anarchist got through.
%speaker_first_name%, you manned the .50 cal that day, right?
Until it jammed. Finished with grenades and harsh language.
And that's why we do weapons maintenance twice daily now.
equipment,innovation,practical,dolg
Check out this modification. Rigged my detector to my helmet HUD.
That's against regulation equipment specs.
But it works. Hands-free anomaly detection.
Until it fries your brain when it malfunctions.
%speaker_first_name%, you're tech-savvy. What do you think?
Clever, but submit it for testing first. We're not Freedom cowboys.
loners,checkpoint,daily,dolg
Same group of Loners at the checkpoint again. Starting to recognize faces.
The ones who actually follow protocol?
Yeah. Even fill out the forms properly now.
See? System works when people follow it.
One even saluted yesterday. Probably ex-military.
Good. Maybe they'll spread the word. Compliance makes everyone's life easier.
promotion,politics,career,dolg
Heard Sergeant position is opening up in 2nd Platoon.
%speaker_first_name%, you putting in for it?
Maybe. Depends who else is competing.
Kozlov's definitely applying. Brown-noser's been prepping for months.
Let him. Merit speaks louder than ass-kissing.
In theory. But he golfs with the Lieutenant.
Where the fuck do you golf in the Zone?
Exactly my point. Politics over practicality.
drill,emergency,preparation,dolg
EMERGENCY DRILL! All units to containment positions!
Another drill? That's the third this week.
Command's spooked about something. This isn't normal.
%speaker_first_name%, what's your take?
Could be intel about a major emission. Or worse.
Worse than an emission?
Zone expansion. But that's just speculation.
Fuck. Better take these drills seriously then.
Always do. Preparation prevents catastrophe.
rookie,mistake,lesson,dolg
New kid almost caused a containment breach. Left the inner door open during shift change.
Please tell me nothing got through.
Lucky. Just some radiated air. But it could've been bloodsuckers.
What's his punishment?
Week of decontamination duty. He'll never forget protocol again.
%speaker_first_name%, didn't you train that batch?
I did. Already scheduled remedial training for the whole group.
blackmarket,bust,internal,dolg
Internal Security just raided Barracks 3. Found a whole black market operation.
What were they selling?
Artifacts, ammo, even some of our night vision gear.
Fucking traitors. Who was running it?
Corporal Fedorov and two privates. Already in isolation.
Court martial?
Tomorrow. Colonel wants to make an example.
Good. Corruption weakens us more than any anomaly.
philosophy,purpose,doubt,dolg
Ever wonder if we're actually making a difference?
What brought this on?
Zone keeps growing. We keep losing people. Feels like bailing water from a sinking ship.
%speaker_first_name%, that's defeatist talk.
Just being realistic. How long can we hold?
As long as it takes. That's our duty.
Easy to say. Harder when you're writing death notifications.
I know. But what's the alternative? Let it spread unchecked?
No. You're right. Just... sometimes it weighs on you.
That's why we have each other. And vodka. Mostly vodka.
training,combat,preparation,dolg
Live fire exercise tomorrow. Urban combat scenario.
About time. Been too long since proper combat drills.
%speaker_first_name%, you're leading Blue Team, right?
Affirmative. Already scouted the killhouse layout.
Cheater. That's tactical preparation.
No such thing as cheating in combat. Only winning and dying.
weather,conditions,morale,dolg
This rain's been going for five days straight. Everything's molding.
Including my socks. Can smell them from here.
Put in a requisition for weather-resistant gear?
Did that. Got told to "adapt and overcome."
Classic quartermaster response.
%speaker_first_name%, how do you keep your gear dry?
Plastic bags and prayer. Mostly prayer.
civilian,incident,PR,dolg
That journalist is back, asking about the "excessive force" incident.
The one where we saved her cameraman from a pseudogiant?
She's calling it "militaristic overreach."
Her colleague would be calling it "lunch" if we hadn't intervened.
Try explaining that to someone who thinks the Zone is just "misunderstood."
Let PR handle it. We have real work to do.
rivalry,competition,morale,dolg
Alpha Squad's talking shit again. Say we're getting soft on checkpoint duty.
They're just mad we have the highest confiscation rate.
%speaker_first_name%, what should we do about it?
Challenge them to a combat drill. Loser pulls latrine duty for a month.
I like it. Official channels?
Of course. We're not Freedom barbarians.
anomaly,research,science,dolg
Science Division wants volunteers to test new anomaly-resistant fabric.
What happened to the last volunteers?
Still in medical. But they're "mostly" fine.
Define "mostly."
Minor burns, some hair loss. Nothing permanent... probably.
Hard pass.
base,improvements,morale,dolg
New rec room is finally open. Even has a working TV.
What channels do we get?
Static and propaganda. But it's something.
Better than staring at concrete walls.
%speaker_first_name%, you bringing that deck of cards?
Already there. Set up a tournament for tonight.
defense,planning,serious,dolg
Worst case scenario briefing tomorrow. Mandatory attendance.
The "what if the Zone breaches all containment" plan?
That's the one. Final defensive positions, scorched earth protocols.
Cheerful. Nothing like planning your last stand over breakfast.
Better to have a plan than die in chaos.
%speaker_first_name%, you've been through these before. They ever update them?
Every time we lose territory. So yes, frequently.
That's... not reassuring.
Reality rarely is. But we hold the line regardless.
Until we can't. Then we make them pay for every meter.
artifact,psi_field,research,freedom,restriction
Alert all teams! Massive psi-emissions in Jupiter's eastern warehouse complex. Feels like a goddamn kindergarten for Controllers.
Confirmed. My detector's screaming - but interference pattern suggests artifacts. Something new buried in that mess.
Duty patrols are setting up perimeter blocks 500m out. "For our safety". Bullshit! They want first dibs!
Typical Duty dogs. Since when do they care about safety? Remember what they did at the Burner anomaly?
Fuck their barricades. I've got experimental psi-blockers - jury-rigged but functional. Who's crazy enough to run the field with me?
Count me in. Knowledge should be free, not locked behind army wannabes. Recording equipment ready.
Bring extra bolts! We'll map safe paths and share coords openly. Let every stalker profit, not just duty's pet scientists.
Watch for Monolith zealots though. That much psi-energy might've drawn them like moths to a flame.
Standard procedure: shoot fanatics first, debate philosophy later. Meet at the crashed chopper in 20. Stay free, brothers!
supplies,bandits,reciprocity,freedom,ideology
Heads up: Bandits ambushed our medic supply run near the swamp bridge. Lost antibiotics and blood kits.
Those parasitic fucks! Kostya's leg wound's festering. He needs those meds NOW.
Check the freedom cache behind Yanov? Should be emergency stocks.
Already raided. Only empty syringes left. Fucking looters didn't even reseal the container.
I've got two vials of antibiotics. Not much, but take them. No "payment" needed - that's not how we operate.
Appreciated. Meanwhile, let's teach bandits mutual aid. I'll lead a team to their Dark Valley stash point.
Redistribute whatever we find to loners too. Show them true freedom means community, not extortion.
This is why Duty fails. You can't build walls against human need. We build networks.
Exactly. Meet at the burnt farmhouse at dawn. Bring non-lethals - some bandits just need bread before bullets.
artifact,ethics,experiment,freedom,loner
Just found a Fireball artifact fused to a dead rookie's hand near the Circus. Should we harvest it?
Christ. Another one who thought artifacts were toys. Leave it - that's a fucking grave marker now.
But the energy readings are off the charts! We could learn why it bonded permanently.
Learn by desecration? We're not Duty. Tag the body for Ecologists if you're so curious.
Compromise: photograph the fusion pattern, then bolt-burn the site. Knowledge without theft.
Better idea: post coordinates on the shared net. Let every stalker see what happens when you rush.
Now that's Freedom thinking! Turn tragedy into community education. I'll handle the upload.
mutant,evolution,swamp,warning,freedom
Swamp team report: Snorks are hunting in PACKS now. Saw three coordinate an ambush near the church.
Impossible. Snorks are solitary. You sure it wasn't just feeding frenzy?
Positive. One flushed me toward two others hiding underwater. Tactical behavior.
Zone's accelerating mutations. Last week blind dogs started climbing trees in Red Forest.
Share footage with Ecologists? They'll lock it behind "security clearance".
Fuck that. Upload raw vid to our public server. Every stalker deserves to know the new rules.
duty,conflict,border,freedom,standoff
Duty armored column moving toward our Yanov checkpoint! Six exos, two RPGs.
Over artifacts? Again? Let them come. We've got the height advantage and psy-block.
Stand down! It's about that missing patrol. They think we ambushed them near the train yard.
Bullshit. We were mapping anomalies all night. Tell them to check Monolith activity logs.
Too late. Voronin's transmitting: "Return our men or we burn your outpost."
Fucking fascists. I say we jam their COMs and release pseudodogs near their rear flank.
radio,broadcast,propaganda,freedom,recruitment
Freedom Radio test broadcast in 10! Who's got today's main segment?
Me. Exposing how Duty's "artifact seizures" end up in military black markets.
Save that for Wednesday. Today: guide to bypassing Army checkpoints using sewage tunnels.
Add a warning about bloodsuckers in Pipe sector. Two loners got drained yesterday.
End with recruitment pitch? "Tired of paying Duty protection? Fight back with Freedom!"
No. End with Strelok's old quote: "The Zone belongs to those who walk it, not cage it."
technology,heist,mercenaries,freedom,recovery
Confirmed: Mercs stole our prototype emitter from Jupiter lab. Tracking them toward Dead City.
That emitter disrupts brain scorcher fields! They'll sell it to highest bidder.
Assemble intercept team. Priority: recover tech intact. Secondary: leave no witnesses.
Secondary? Since when do we execute?
Since they murdered three scientists for it. This isn't theft - it's war.
anomaly,weather,research,freedom,emergency
EMERGENCY: Electro-storm forming over Truck Cemetery! Not natural - radiating from ground zero.
Fuck. That's where we stored the artifact resonance array. Did someone activate it?
Worse. Duty tried to dismantle it "for safety". Now it's overloading.
Evacuate nearby loners! Tell them to seek basement shelters immediately.
I'll lead a suicide team to plant ion disruptors. Volunteers?
Make it volunteer ONLY. No orders today - just free men saving free men.
supplies,hunger,community,freedom,ration
Last food shipment got destroyed by pseudogiants. We've got three days of rations max.
Open the communal kitchen to ALL stalkers. No Freedom ID checks.
That'll empty our stocks in hours! We need to prioritize fighters.
Bullshit hierarchy talk! We share or we become Duty. I'll donate my personal stash.
Organize hunting parties. Army Warehouses deer are still clean. Who knows radiation levels?
I'll test meat on myself first. Better radiation than watching kids starve at Skadovsk.
strelok,legend,rumor,freedom,investigation
Crazy report from newbie: saw a stalker in vintage SEVA suit walking THROUGH an anomaly at night.
Hallucination. Probably ate bad canned food.
But he described the patch: Clear Sky insignia with red stripe. That's Strelok's gear.
Don't spread ghost stories. Strelok's dead or worse - absorbed by the Zone.
Then why did all detectors flatline when he appeared? I'm investigating tomorrow.
Take backup! If it's REALLY him... he might know how to end this nightmare.
bandits,negotiation,truce,freedom,ambush
Bandit messenger at perimeter. Says their boss wants "temporary alliance" against Monolith.
Lies. They just want our northern tunnel access.
Actually... Monolith IS pushing hard into Dark Valley. Even bandits are fleeing.
So? Let fanatics kill parasites. Saves us bullets.
Unthinkable! If Monolith takes the valley, they flank OUR positions. Temporary truce?
Counter-proposal: We defend the valley TOGETHER, but bandits open all loot stashes to loners.
experiment,psy,risk,freedom,volunteer
Psy-blocker v2.0 ready for field test. 85% chance of permanent neural damage. Volunteers?
You're insane! That's suicide.
Not if it works. Imagine walking through Brain Scorcher unprotected! Ultimate freedom.
I'll do it. My brother's mindless near CNPP. If this saves others...
Log every sensation! Pain, whispers, time distortion - we'll broadcast findings live.
Duty would lock this research away. We risk everything for human knowledge. That's our creed.
defector,duty,interrogation,freedom,asylum
Duty lieutenant surrendered at gates! Claims Voronin ordered execution squads for "weak" soldiers.
Classic fascist purge. Where's he now?
Medbay. Took three bullets escaping. Demands political asylum.
Could be trap. Duty loves false-flag ops.
Interrogation reveals something bigger: Duty's building a scalar weapon using artifacts.
Shit. If true, we must sabotage it. Freedom can't let them weaponize the Zone.
art,monolith,culture,freedom,preservation
Found something incredible in Pripyat hotel: murals painted with GLOWING pigments. Not radiation - actual art.
Monolith zealots? They decorate their shrines sometimes.
No. These show pre-Chornobyl life. Kids playing, forests... signed "S. Kaidanovsky".
A stalker artist? Before the second disaster?
We must preserve this! Duty will destroy it as "corrupting influence".
Document everything. Humanity isn't dead while we create beauty in hell.
anniversary,celebration,tradition,freedom,memory
Freedom Day tomorrow! Who's handling the "Wall of Names" ceremony?
Me. Added 17 new names this year... mostly lost to Duty raids.
Pour extra vodka for Luger. He held the bridge alone against Monolith in '24.
Play his final transmission during moment of silence: "Tell them I died free!"
New tradition: burn a Duty helmet in the bonfire?
No. We honor OUR dead, not obsess over enemies. That's what separates us.
orders,protocol,army
All units, maintain perimeter security. No unauthorized personnel beyond the checkpoint.
Copy that, command. Rules of engagement if stalkers approach?
Warning shots first. We're here to contain the Zone, not harm civilians.
Understood. Holding position and following protocol.
equipment,supplies,army
Supply convoy arriving at 1400 hours. All squads prepare to receive ammunition.
Finally! We've been running low on 5.45 rounds.
Government keeping us well-supplied, unlike these ragtag stalkers.
checkpoint,procedure,discipline,military,protocol
Checkpoint Alpha to Command: Why are we processing stalkers without biometric scans? SOP requires verification.
Command to Alpha: Scanner damaged during emission. Temporary exception authorized by Lt. Kovalchuk.
Sir, that's how contraband gets through! Saw Freedom scout with bulging backpack yesterday.
Maintain visual inspection only. Replacement parts delayed in Kyiv bureaucracy. Welcome to the Zone.
Understood. Request permission to implement manual pat-downs. These anarchists exploit weaknesses.
artifact,confiscation,quota,military,procedure
Patrol 7 reporting: Confiscated three Jellyfish artifacts from Loner group near Agroprom.
Documented properly? Last shipment had missing paperwork. Science Corps is furious.
Affirmative. Photographed with owners before seizure. One resisted - now in detention.
Good. Remember: Monthly quota is 20 artifacts minimum. Command pressures us for results.
Understood. Suggest raiding Bandit stash in Dark Valley. Intel suggests they're hoarding.
mutant,containment,protocol,military,emergency
URGENT: Pseudogiant breached outer perimeter near Cordon! Engaging with heavy weapons!
Command authorizes RPGs. Do NOT let it reach civilian areas. Containment priority one!
Target down! But... it was wearing military dog tags. Serial number matches Corporal Ivanov.
Jesus. He disappeared during Yantar mission last week. Document everything and incinerate remains.
Sir, the mutation rate... if this spreads beyond Zone perimeter...
Classified conversation only. Report to debriefing room immediately. This never happened.
duty,cooperation,alliance,military,strategy
Joint op with Duty at 0600. Secure northern anomaly cluster for Ecologist study.
Why work with those fanatics? Last joint patrol ended with three men "accidentally" grenaded.
Kyiv's orders. Their anomaly detectors are superior. Maintain professional distance.
Warning: Duty commander Voronin requested operational control. Denied per protocol 7-Alpha.
Understood. Will have snipers overwatching their positions. Trust but verify.
desertion,manhunt,traitor,military,punishment
ALERT: Private Volkov deserted with night vision gear and encryption codes. Last seen near Garbage.
Track implant signal. Shoot on sight if resisting. Codes compromise entire northern network.
Signal lost near Freedom territory. Intercepted comms suggest they're offering him asylum.
Contact Svoboda command: Return traitor immediately or we cut their Yanov supply route.
They refuse. Volkov claims "political persecution". Request permission for extraction raid.
corruption,supplies,investigation,military,blackmarket
Inventory discrepancy: 2000 rounds 5.45mm missing. Third shortage this month.
Check Sergeant Petrenko's logs. His patrols always coincide with Bandit market days.
Confirmed. Thermal drone shows him meeting Bandit leader "Skull" near abandoned factory.
Apprehend quietly. Interrogate before he contacts accomplices. This goes to Kyiv's ears only.
Sir... he's requesting emergency extraction. Claims to be undercover intelligence asset.
monolith,intelligence,psychic,military,threat
Recon team found Monolith psionic transmitters in Red Forest. Advanced design.
Science Corps analysis: Tech matches pre-disaster military prototypes. How did they get it?
Intercepted transmission: "Project Cradle active". Sound familiar? Chernobyl incident files.
Classify Level Gamma. This suggests external support for Monolith. Possible sabotage.
Recommend immediate drone strike on transmitter cluster. Before they activate full network.
interrogation,stalker,intelligence,military,torture
Prisoner #42 cracked. Gave coordinates to Freedom's main artifact cache in Jupiter.
Verification? Last "confession" led us into an anomaly field.
Drone thermal scan matches description. Heavy guard presence. Worth the risk?
Prepare raid team. Capture leader "Chekhov" alive - he knows their supply networks.
And the prisoner? He's begging for amnesty.
Standard disposal. We don't waste medical resources on terrorists.
border,breach,containment,military,emergency
BREACH ALERT: Southern fence section destroyed! Multiple stalker groups flooding through!
Containment protocol Zulu! Seal sector 9! Authorize lethal force!
Sir - it's not stalkers... mutants! Bloodsucker pack breached the barrier!
How?! Fence has 10,000V current! Unless... internal sabotage?
Forensic team found cut wires. Professional job. Duty insignia nearby.
radiation,containment,emergency,military,evacuation
Radiation spike in sector 5! Levels exceeding Chernobyl '86 readings!
Source? Ecologists promised containment after last emission.
Unauthorized artifact drilling by Bandits. They punctured a radioactive burial mound.
Evacuate nearby villages! Deploy chemical battalions for decon. Shoot looters on sight.
Wind carries fallout toward Kyiv in 72 hours. Requesting national emergency protocols.
conscription,protest,morale,military,discipline
New conscripts refusing patrol duty. Claim "suicide mission" after Delta squad's wipeout.
Court martial the ringleaders. We need examples during wartime.
Sir, they're teenagers. Saw their friends mutated last week. Morale is critical.
Rotate them to checkpoint duty. Double rations for volunteers to Red Zone patrols.
No volunteers. Suggest... alternative motivation? Bandit prisoners need "disposal".
duty,betrayal,ambush,military,retaliation
Ambush confirmed: Duty units fired on our convoy near Rostok. Three vehicles destroyed.
Casualties? This violates the non-aggression pact!
12 dead. They stole artifact shipment for Science Corps. Voronin claims "preemptive strike".
Scramble attack helicopters! Level their checkpoint at Army Warehouses!
Command vetoed. Kyiv orders restraint. "Alliance more important than revenge."
evacuation,classified,retreat,military,coverup
EYES ONLY: Operation CLOAK commences at 2300. Destroy all classified materials.
Evacuation? But command said hold the perimeter at all costs!
New intelligence: Second Chernobyl-level event imminent. We're abandoning outer sectors.
What about the Ecologists? The stalker settlements?
No warnings. Plausible deniability. God have mercy on their souls.
contract,bid,client,mercenary,negotiation
New job offer on encrypted channel. Client wants Freedom's Yanov depot leveled. 24-hour deadline.
Price? And do we know which corp is backing this?
50k USD upfront, 50k post-op. No identifiers - payment in untraceable crypto.
Smells like Duty subcontracting. Their usual MO when they want deniability.
Regardless - we need the funds. I'll authorize thermite charges. Leave no hardware salvageable.
artifact,recovery,extraction,mercenary,breach
Target secured: Soul artifact in Ecologist bunker. Heavy guard presence - 6 scientists, 4 exosuits.
Client wants live samples too. Neutralize resistance, bag two researchers minimum.
Copy. Deploying sleep gas through vents. Remember - no Ukrainian nationals per contract clause 4B.
One complication: Monolith warband approaching from north. They're drawn to the artifact.
Accelerate timetable. Extract now, leave false trail toward Duty outpost. Let them clean up.
betrayal,cleanup,witness,mercenary,protocol
Problem: Local guide saw too much during the Limansk extraction. Currently detained in safehouse.
Standard disposal? Or does he have leverage?
Claims knowledge of our Dead City routes. Also... he's Bandit leader Skull's cousin.
Stage an accident. Make it look like Monolith attack. We still need Bandit intel networks.
Copy. Planting psy-emitter on body before dumping near CNPP. They'll blame the fanatics.
auction,artifact,corporate,mercenary,bidding
Fireball artifact secured. Three corporate bids already: 75k (ZionTech), 90k (Kevlar-M), 110k (unnamed).
Play them against each other. Leak to ZionTech that Kevlar has military buyers.
Done. Zion counter-offered 130k with bonus for exclusivity on future finds.
Accept - but make copy of emission signature first. Sell data separately to Ecologists.
Double-dip approved. Packaging artifact with fake Duty markings for plausible deniability.
sabotage,gear,falseflag,mercenary,deception
Client wants Ukrainian Army's new anomaly detectors disabled before patrol deployment.
Storage facility has biometric locks. Need inside man or diversion.
Solution: Bribe logistics sergeant with artifact fragments. Else, gas leak explosion cover.
Too messy. Hack their supply system - reroute detectors through Garbage ambush point.
